-27-
FISHER:
I am one of the many who have been asked that question
point-blank, who have seen it in the faces of the young
men and women of Asia and the Middle East. These same
questions have been faced by the distinguished author of
Strange Lands And Friendly People, the book from which
the foregoing happenings in the Middle East have been
taken. Mr. Justice William 0. Douglas of the United States
Supreme Court has traveled among these new neighbors of
ours on the other side of the world, he has talked with
them in their villages and in their towns. And he has
been deeply moved. Justice Douglas.
